import "./postDetail.css" import { ChatBubbleOutline, FavoriteBorder, Share, BookmarkBorder, MoreHoriz, SentimentSatisfiedAlt, Favorite } from "@mui/icons-material"; import {useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {fetchPostDetail, getPost, getPostsbyID, likePost} from "../../redux/postsSlice"; import PostAuthor from "./postAuthor"; import PostAvatar from "./postAvatar"; import {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import {useAuth} from "../../hooks"; import TimeAgo from "./TimeAgo"; import {axiosPrivate} from "../../axios/axios"; const PostDetail = () => { const auth = useAuth() const dispatch = useDispatch() const { postId } = useParams() const post = useSelector(getPost) const [author, setAuthor] = useState({ username: '', avatar: '', }) const [likes, setLikes] = useState(post?.likes) const hasLikedPost = post?.likes?.find((like) => like === auth._id) useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchPostDetail({id: postId})) }, [postId]); useEffect( () => { const fetch = async () => { await axiosPrivate.get(`/users/p/${post.userId}`) .then((response) => { const username = response?.data?.username const avatar = response?.data?.avatar setAuthor({username, avatar}) }) .catch(err => err.message) } fetch() },[]) if (!post) { return (

Post not found!

) } const handleLike = () => { dispatch(likePost({id: post._id, userId: auth._id})) .unwrap() .then() .catch(err => { return err.message }) if (hasLikedPost) { setLikes(post.likes.filter((id) => id !== auth._id)); } else { setLikes([...post.likes, auth._id]); } } return (
{author ? author.username : 'Unknown author'}
